role_description: An Ansible role that installs and configures gist (potentially the best command-line gister) on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [gist](https://github.com/defunkt/gist) provides a command that you can use from your terminal to upload content to https://gist.github.com/. This role will optionally set up a dotfile that handles authentication if you pass the appropriate configuration.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs and configures gist (potentially the best command-line gister) on nearly any platform.
